title: [PS3] Megamind: Ultimate Showdown
description:
When the Megamind Movie Ends Our Story Begins

Just as Megamind has become our new Mega Hero, a sudden crime wave hits the city. The Doom Syndicate and their Doom Goons have emerged and are looking to take over. Only Megamind and his arsenal of gadgets can stop them. Now, in a unique gameplay experience for PlayStation 3 players can be the ultimate Mega Hero either by themselves or playing in co-op mode with a friend.

* Battle Mega Villains Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Take on the vilest villains, the Doom Syndicate, for the ultimate showdown
* Operate a Variety of Mega Gadgets Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Outsmart enemies with the De-Gun, Tesla Gloves and more
* Build Ingenious Inventions Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Track down and defeat your enemies with the Mega Essence Tracker and Bio Essence Neutralizer
